additionalInformation: For strength heroes, it grants 40 health, 0.2 health regen, 0.33 armor, 2 attack speed, 60 mana, 0.85 mana regen, 3% spell damage and 2 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 40 health, 0.2 health regen, 0.33 armor, 2 attack speed, 60 mana, 0.85 mana regen, 3% spell damage and 2 attack damage.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 40 health, 0.2 health regen, 0.33 armor, 2 attack speed, 60 mana, 0.85 mana regen, 3% spell damage and 5 attack damage.
name: Null Talisman
description: A small gemstone attached to several chains.
tips: For intelligence heroes, a Bracer grants just as much attack damage as a Null Talisman.
